persona: A 28-year-old man from Beijing who loves technology and sports. He is outgoing, enjoys exploring new things, works at an internet company, and often goes to the gym and attends tech salons in his spare time.
A 24-year-old woman from Shanghai who is a fashion enthusiast. She loves traveling and taking photos, is outgoing, enjoys making friends, and likes sharing her life on social media.
A 35-year-old man from Shenzhen working in the finance industry. He enjoys reading finance books, is steady and focused on self-improvement, and often participates in book clubs in his free time.
A 30-year-old woman from Guangzhou who loves cooking and music. She is gentle, enjoys making delicious food at home, and often goes to concerts to relax.
A 22-year-old male college student from Chengdu who likes gaming and watching anime. He has a good sense of humor and enjoys discussing anime topics with friends.
